Name: Pastey
Overview: A lightweight, self-hosted paste platform (Pastebin alternative) with language detection and on-disk encryption.

@attributes.Name: PASTEY_RESTRICT_PASTING
@attributes.Description: Enable/disable restricting of pasting to whitelisted users.

@attributes.Name: PASTEY_RESTRICT_RAW_PASTING
@attributes.Description: Enable/disable restricting of pasting via /raw to whitelisted users.

@attributes.Name: PASTEY_RATE_LIMIT
@attributes.Description: Rate limit for pasting, for non-whitelisted users.

@attributes.Name: PASTEY_RECENT_PASTES
@attributes.Description: Number of recent pastes to show on the home page.

@attributes.Name: PASTEY_BEHIND_PROXY
@attributes.Description: Inform Pastey if it is behind a reverse proxy (nginx, etc.). If this is the case, it will rely on HTTP headers X-Real-IP or X-Forwarded-For. NOTE: Make sure your proxy config sets these values.

@attributes.Name: PASTEY_USE_WHITELIST
@attributes.Description: Enable/disable whitelisting for admin tasks (view recent, delete, config).

@attributes.Name: PASTEY_WHITELIST_CIDR
@attributes.Description: List of whitelisted IP addresses or networks (in CIDR format).

@attributes.Name: PASTEY_GUESS_THRESHOLD
@attributes.Description: Threshold for automatic language detection guesses. If a result is below this value, it is treated as Plaintext.
